title: Browser de-animator feature
body: Request de-animator feature for MS Edge will let people use their browser again at work and in an office environment. This feature will let users open all browser windows without any distracting animations or auto-playing video. Flash or html5 graphics will be frozen, displayed in black and white, non-animated.  No surprise sounds or video will be played out loud.  This will replace the need for ad block and pacify advertisers at the same time; because it does not completely block their messages. But it does restore some dignity to the browsing experience for whom would again like to use the internet for news gathering.
